attributes.action: stop all persons with an arrest,allegation,any form of array with a marked full enhanced disclosures, from working in government offices or houses of commons,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: anyone that has a criminal re cord of arrests allegations hearsay or others ,against that said person shall be at no time allowed to wrok for a government office parliament or houses of commons or lords at any time during the diclosures proceses,anyone with a crimninal backround check or of criminal past allegation

rejection.details: This is a matter for communication with Parliament and the Civil Service.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
